name: Applied Machine Learning
tagline: Course files for DAT203.3x: Applied Machine Learning
body:
![Applied Machine Learning](https://courses.edx.org/asset-v1:Microsoft+DAT203.3x+5T2016+type@asset+block@DAT203.3x.png)

Explore theory and practice, and work with tools like R, Python, and Azure Machine Learning to solve advanced data science problems.

This GitHub repository contains the lab files for the course.
If you'd like to attend the course, sign up for free on [edX](https://www.edx.org/course/applied-machine-learning-microsoft-dat203-3x).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
